title: PLS HELP
body: I need help my account is hacked and now its suspended they changed everything i dont know what to do pls help lot of rp spent ?

replies.body: Hey, is it the account that you're posting from?  Don't worry, our account team can help with recovery and any reparations.  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and an account specialist will reach out to you.  We'll reply back as soon as we can, hang tight!
